quote: My mind seems to have become a kind of machine for grinding general laws out of large collections of facts. – Charles Darwin
fact: Odds of being killed by lightening? 1 in 2million/killed in a car crash? 1 in 5,000/killed by falling out of bed? 1 in 2million/killed in a plane crash? 1 in 25 million.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: People are making apocalypse jokes like there’s no tomorrow.
